full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I ZHAL BCU GCIG PA DPAL MO LUGS KYI SGRUB THABS SMYUNG BAR GNAS PA'I CHO GA BCAS PHAN 'DI SNANG BA SAR DNGOS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,*, ,THUGS RJE CHEN PO BCU GCIG ZHAL MO'I LUGS KYI DBANG GI BLA MA RGYUD PA'I GSOL 'DEBS BZHUGS SO, ,*, ,BSNYUNG BAR GNAS CHO GA'I LAS BUM BSGRUB BZHUGS SO, ,*, ,SPYOD 'JUG GI MCHOD LE NAS BYUNG BA'I NYER MKHO NI BZHUGS S+HO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @024B ('PHAGS PA THUGS RJE CHEN PO ZHAL BCU GCIG PA GRUB DBANG DPAL MO'I LUGS KYI SGRUB THABS MYUNGS BAR GNAS PA'I CHO GA DANG @025A *, ,BYA TSUL DANG BCAS PA 'PHAN TE'I SNANG BA SAR DNGOS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI BSTAN PA'I SAL BYED DZA SA PA NI HU THOG THU DANG BCAS,,` ,,STAG PU SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, CHOS 'KHOR RGYAL MKHAN ZUR SKU SKYE RAB 'BYAMS PA BSKAL BZANG RAB RGYAS, LHA LDAN SPRO BTE LANG SAR BA'I DKAR PO PHYOGS BRGYANG BA SPYI TSOGS DANG, 'BRAS SPUNGS, SMYONG BA AOR DU SU PI'I SE RNAMS RGYAL RDO RJE SHOG BKA' BCU KLU SGRUB RGYA MTSO, BDE YANG RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG NOR BU SOGS NAS BSKUL MA RIM PAR BYUNG BAR BRTEN RTZOM 'DUN THOG NYE CHAR KHA NAS DANG STOBS DANG PA, KHE PE'I AAM PA BE'I SI TSE MCHOG SKYABS KYIS BSKUL MA BYUNG BAR BRTEN, DPAL MGON 'PHAGS PA KLU SGRUB DANG, GRUB BRNYES DPAL MOS MDZAD PA'I RGYA GZHUNG SOGS LA GZHIGS, GTZO CHER PHYAG NA PADMO THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS 'JUG PA BDE BAR BRTEN DAR PO CHE BAR 'DUG PAS DE NYID GZHI BZUNG, MKHAS GRUB TSANG LDAN GZHAN GYI MDZAD PA'I CHO GA DANG, DAM PA'I PHYAG ZHES GSOG NS, KHA 'GONG POS KYIS SOGS PAR BRGYAN TE, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG CHOS SMRA BA BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS 'PHAGS PA 'JIG RTEN DBANG PHYUG GI PHO BRANG PO TA LA'I GZIMS CHUNG NYI 'OD 'KHYIL BAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DAR KHAN DGE SLONG BSKAL BZANG YON TAN GYIS BGYIS PA'O,, ,,AOm MA nI PADME H'Um,, ,,)
